text: Allahale timro lagi svayam timro e'uta udaharanako varnana gareko cha. Je jati maile timila'i di'irakheko chu ke timro dasaharumadhyeko pani kohi tyasama hakadara cha? Ki timi ra tini tyasama barabara bhagidara chau? Ra timile unisita yasto dara'umchau jasto timi aphnai (bha'iâ€“ansiyaraharu) sita dara'umchau hamile bud'dhimanaharuko lagi yastai spasta gariâ€“gari ayataharu varnana gardachaum
